Very stressful, very fun, highly recommended.

This is a really fun game when you have a group of friends doing a custom match. You don't get experience towards your leveling when you do a custom match, but knowing everyone that you are working with and running away from a killer you know makes it just 10x more fun. I love the maps and the different killers. I love that they incorporate different movies and games and pop culture horror references. The perks system is a little confusing but I do like that the leveling is shared over all the characters you could possibly play. Highly recommend. First 4 vs. 1 games I have played that I have actually enjoyed.

I love how being a rank 10 killer means that you face off against rank 1 survivors. This game is perfectly balanced and has no issues whatsoever.

This game is something special. Never have I ever wanted to punch a hole in my monitor, but kept going back to this game. It's like a toxic relationship. The game itself is fun. A cool concept and cool survivors and killers. Mechanically, the game is terrible. Poor optimization, so many glitches. I wish the devs would put more time into fixing bugs instead of trying to branch out on mobile and lots of other unneeded things.

I didn't think I would like this game as much as I do. I mostly run survivor and would like to play killer as soon as I buy The Plague's  dlc. It's super fun. I love the fact that you don't have to own all the dlc to still be able to enter certain maps and be pitted against certain killers, unlike alot of mmo games where you absoloutly have to purchase dlc to be able to play with anything/anyone within dlc realms.

игра для тех у кого нету друзей, ибо игра требует от вас индивидуальности при этом взаимопонимание между своими тимейтами. понравилось то что я в игре не чувствовал себя одиноко как в других играх которые гораздо больше требует от вас хорошо напарника, это не минус а в своем роде плюс (не все игры же должны фокусироваться на командную игру ибо теряется фокус на индивид (личное пространства потенциала )

   насчет своих осушение и эмоции в игре. я блога получено  получил доли адреналина и необычных чувств. главное игра дает игрокам чувствовать страх и моментальных-спонтанных решении (ЭТО МАТЬ ТВОЮ КРУТО) моя реальная жизнь скучна и я в нем не получаю достаточного  человеческого эмоции а игра дает мне всего этого нереального атмосферы. 
      минусы игры. пока не знаю все нормально есть конечно пару багов и недоработок. хотелось бы большего яркого расчленение, это конечно мое личное извращение но все же не было б лишним.
купить ли игру? я лично купил по скидке ибо я из бедной странны где моя мама зарабатывает не больше чем 150 баксов в месяц, это грустно. советую приобрести игру ради бури адреналина на все 50 часов.

Pros: Features unique characters and play styles. Easy to understand mechanics, and an in-depth talent system to customize characters the way you want to play them.

Cons: This game features the most toxic community I have ever encountered in my life. There seems to be a common trend of survivors bullying killers post-game, especially if a killer wins. Since the game can be somewhat scary (at times), I've wondered if mob mentality or bullying is actually a coping mechanism for survivors to "stand up" to what they're afraid of...? Maybe? In any case, this game requires some tough skin to play. Would not recommend to anyone looking to have fun.
Muy divertido para jugar entre amigos y poder jugar en equipo

I started this game right in the beginning and I have to say that through the years of experience it truly is a good game. Of course it had it's ups and downs, and in my opinon it's not as good as it was when it first came out but I do believe that the devs try to their best to balence the fun for both surrviors and killers. If you want a true experience I'd say play with at least a friend or more because it can be infintly more fun when you're screaming for your life and your companion comes to save your dumbass from the hook.

CARTA DE UM SOBREVIVENTE
- Por favor, leia-me!

Dizem que tem um serial killer solto por aí, duvidei, mas finalmente vi o cretino. Ele matou meu amigo com as próprias mãos na minha frente, enquanto os outros estavam fisgados no gancho.

Não sei o que fazer ou para onde ir... Sinto falta do mercadinho que tinha perto do ferro-velho antes de tudo isso acontecer.

Eu perdi quase tudo que tinha, só me sobraram as roupas do corpo e um relógio que rachou o visor quando eu pulei por uma janela, mas pelo menos consigo ver as horas.

Vi que existem dois grandes portões e alguns geradores quebrados, mas consertá-los levaria muito tempo e o risco de ser pego pelo assassino é muito grande. Eu lembrei que o meu amigo falou sobre uma escotilha que estava em algum lugar, mas estou desesperado e não lembro onde é o lugar que ele disse ter visto.

Estou marcando as horas enquanto escrevo esta carta e desde que todos os outros morreram, eu estou há 412 horas procurando a escotilha para fugir daqui.

Se você leu essa carta, é um sinal para ter cuidado com cada movimento. O serial killer é esperto e ele vai te caçar em todos os lugares. Ahh... E me parece que os corvos são aliados do assassino, eles dirão onde você está quase o tempo todo.

Lamentosamente,
Fabelix
Buen juego. Tanto si te gusta jugar solo o con amigos.

Mir gefällt am meisten, dass es nie langweilig wird und das liegt nicht zuletzt daran, dass man permanent gegen menschliche Spieler spielt. Der Mensch ist nur bis zu einem gewissen Punkt berechenbar, was auch die Situation mit entscheidet. Hinzukommt natürlich der ständige Support und die Verbesserungen die immer wieder regelmäßig ins Spiel fließen.
Es ist ein Spiel mit einer gnadenlosen Lernkurve, aber wenn man frustresistent auf Dauer ist und bereit ist sich an etwas die Zähne auszubeißen, der muss sich diese Spiel holen und sich mit Überlebenden sowie Killern auf der Ganzen Welt messen.
Denkt immer dran... DER ENTITUS SCHLÄFT NIE.

Despite all the hate that you can think of about Servers, bugs, and game being un balanced when someone doesn't want to play like the others. Well This game can be frustrating although there is the other side. It's a great party game, that being said it's not competetive but it can be challanging if you wan't to learn looping and builds.

That's why you may spend a tons of hours in the game. And still get more with new content, released always on time. It's just perfect if you want a good Coop game with regular month-to-month updates. They are keeping player base healthy even if some problems will never get solved. I still like and appreciate the time I've spent in it.

Perfect choice if you want indeepth horror-coop game based on perks, but relatively easy to get into. Well just be prepared to have some free time unlocking all may take a while... if not forever. Most of the DLC characters can be obtained without buying DLC, so just play the game.
camp is annoying but the game is awesome
